booking_requirements: To register for procedures, you must provide correct contact information. We reserve the right to confirm or refuse a booking.
cancellation_policy_text: The client can cancel the appointment no later than 24 hours before the scheduled time. If canceled less than 24 hours in advance, a penalty of 50% of the cost of the service may be charged.
client_obligations: The client is obliged to inform the specialist about the presence of any medical contraindications, allergies or health conditions before the procedure.
contact_info: For any questions related to these Terms, you can contact us
dissatisfaction_policy: If dissatisfied with the result, the client must contact the salon within 7 days to discuss possible solutions.
general_provisions_text: These Terms of Use govern the use of the M.Le Diamant Beauty Lounge services. By using our services you agree to these terms.
late_arrival: If the client is more than 15 minutes late, the salon reserves the right to cancel the appointment or shorten the procedure time.
payment_details: Payment is made in cash or by card after the service is provided. Prices for services are indicated in the price list and are subject to change without prior notice.
privacy_commitment: We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information in accordance with our Privacy Policy.
quality_guarantee: We guarantee the quality of the materials used and the professionalism of our craftsmen. The results of the procedures may vary depending on the individual characteristics of the client.
salon_liability: The salon is not responsible for the consequences of procedures if the client conceals information about medical contraindications.
